item.description:
Law of Attraction states that what you focus on, you attract. If you want something, it is recommended that you focus on what you want, versus "what is". But what do you do if "what is" feels too true to deny? What about "reality"? Does this trip you up or have you stuck?

In July's meetup, we'll be talking about how to get out of spinning your wheels in your reality, and being stuck in what is versus where you want to be.

Come to shift your gears into the reality you want!

As always, we will begin by activating a feeling good, Source-full state; and we will close with time for group coaching and support on any issue you like. Bring your questions!

We're happy to hang around afterwards for more chatting, and feel free to come early, too, to socialize and snack.

If you RSVP "Yes", please show up. If you need to change your plans, please let us know. It really helps us with our planning and in being able to start on time. Thank you for cooperating with this.

Can't wait to co-create with you!

Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: Click on meeting location for directions. We're down a long driveway, so look for mailbox at end.

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: July Meetup: What about "reality"?
